text.tspan: Software Loading Manager to HMI API
to make it available in File -> new
- The number of software updates that are available
- The current state of the updates see
- Emited when update_state() or update_count() changes
- The user has approved these pending updates
- The user has indicated that they should retry the installation after an error
- A list of the currently outstanding packages
- An item in the details() list has changed state
- A user-visible error to display if update_state is 'error'
